activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#1975
activity.text: The search functionality is not working in the staging environments of both the DSEP and ODR apps.

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#2015
activity.text: In the DSEP app (Dev environment), the app crashes when clicking on any search result.

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#2028
activity.text: In the ODR app, if the user does not fill in the "Dispute Details" field and tries to save, the app crashes.

activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#2025
activity.text: In the DSEP app, the course fee displayed on the search page differs from the fee shown at checkout.
